posts.title: Start
posts.body: I like to think of myself as an out-of-the-box thinker (in spite of the clich√© irony that sentence carries). After a game of Codenames with some friends where I walked away a bit frustrated, my wife assured me I'm not bad at the game because I am "an out-of-the-box thinker." I replied that maybe that is true, but there is no benefit in being an out-of-the-box thinker if I can't communicate with others how and what I think. So here's my attempt to communicate.
